name: MommaFlex BoxVFINAL
description:
Find the MommaFlex Box and, like, don't fall off.

WASD to move.

Spacebar to jump.

Mouse to move camera around.

Best box-finding game evar.

Made by:

Computer Graphics Eugenio Aguiree Flores

Programacion: Jorge Gonzales y Carlos de la Garza

Animacion: Carlos de la Garza

Musica: Pedro Prandini
